lead_paragraph: Judge Gonzalo Curiel, whose impartiality was once questioned by Donald J. Trump, said there were enough questions about Mr. Trump’s alleged dealings with his former students to continue with the case.

headline.print_headline: Trial Allowed in Student Suit Against Trump
headline.main: Federal Judge Allows Suit Against Trump University to Proceed

snippet: Judge Gonzalo Curiel, whose impartiality was once questioned by Donald J. Trump, said there were enough questions about Mr. Trump’s alleged dealings with his former students to continue with the case....
abstract: Federal Judge Gonzalo P Curiel in San Diego rules federal lawsuit brought up against Donald J Trump by former students of Trump University can proceed to trial; says statements from plaintiffs raise significant questions about whether Trump knowingly participated in fraudulent practices in advertising school.
